events.name: Satanic Symbolism
events.description: Where do the symbols of Satanism come from and what exactly do they mean? Lecture by local Satanic Salem witch Thomas Vallor. This is an hour long presentation.

events.name: Korean Street Food Cooking
events.description: Satanic Chef Adam Dodge shares cooking tips and tricks on how to cook Korean Pancakes the traditional way and a dipping sauce that will go along and some really awesome lettuce wraps.

events.name: DJ Mercy Maelica
events.description: TST Salem's Mercy Maelica spins songs of isolation and despair. 80s/90s goth and industrial, metal, obscure and pop electronica and occasional rap.

events.name: BaphoNet 101: An Introduction to Satanic Social Media
events.description: This room offers a closer look at BaphoNet Antisocial Network. Aria deSatanas gives a short presentation and then will host a short Q and A for all interested.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry
events.description: Meet your new best friend, a fruit bat or insect bat from BatWorld, a shelter in Texas that cares for these sweethearts. Learn more about their work at batworld.org

events.name: Library
events.description: The Satanic Panic Archive Library is open all night. Many of these texts exist nowhere else in the world.

events.name: Down the Rabbit Hole
events.description: Meet Winston and Winona, Ada's beloved rabbits!
